metadata.title: UK newspapers' representations of the 2009e10 outbreak of swine flu: one health scare not over-hyped by the media?

abstract.original_text: Background A/H1N1, more commonly referred to as swine flu, emerged in Mexico in spring 2009. It rapidly spread across the world and was classed as a global pandemic on 11 June 2009. Objective To analyse UK newsprint coverage of the swine flu pandemic. Methods Content analysis of 2374 newsprint articles published in eight UK national newspapers between 1
